title: Virtual Internship Program (VTP’9 NANO)
description: Participated in an intensive virtual internship program focusing on enterprise IT infrastructure and modern development workflows. Gained hands-on experience with Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems. Mastered No-Code development platforms to streamline business processes and focused on professional Web Design, including Responsive Web Design (RWD) and Frontend development. Successfully completed various corporate IT tasks, ensuring high-quality standards in project deliverables.
